alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 12:19AM CDT until April 15 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Western Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1219 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Atchison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include...Williams St. Joseph, Atchison, Elwood, Rushville, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Iatan, Bean Lake and Lewis And Clark Vi. This includes Interstate 229 between mile markers 2 and 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
